title: Transformer
description: In a world where alien robots can transform into vehicles, a young mechanic discovers a hidden power that could change the fate of humanity. As he teams up with a group of rebels, they must battle against a sinister force that threatens to take over the Earth.

title: Meg 2
description: The sequel to the thrilling underwater adventure, 'Meg 2' follows a team of scientists who venture deeper into the ocean's depths, only to encounter an even larger and more terrifying prehistoric shark. Survival becomes a race against time as they fight to escape the jaws of death.

title: Fast X
description: The Fast & Furious franchise returns with 'Fast X', where Dom Toretto and his crew face their most dangerous adversary yet. As they race against time to save their loved ones, they must confront their past and the consequences of their actions.

title: Jailer
description: In 'Jailer', a retired lawman must return to action when his family is threatened by a powerful crime syndicate. With his unique skills and relentless determination, he embarks on a mission to bring justice to those who have wronged him.

title: Beautiful Disaster
description: A college romance blossoms between two polar opposites: a bad boy with a troubled past and a straight-laced girl with dreams of a perfect future. As they navigate their differences, they discover that love can be the most beautiful disaster of all.

title: Ape vs. Mecha Ape
description: In a battle for supremacy, a genetically enhanced ape faces off against a powerful robotic counterpart. As the two titans clash, the fate of their world hangs in the balance, and a young scientist must find a way to stop the destruction.

title: Assassin
description: An elite assassin is forced out of retirement when a powerful crime lord threatens his family. As he navigates a world of betrayal and danger, he must confront his past and fight for the future he desires.

title: No Hard Feelings
description: A woman in her thirties agrees to be a 'fake girlfriend' for a shy young man about to head off to college. As they navigate their unconventional relationship, they discover unexpected feelings and the importance of being true to oneself.

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
description: In this reimagining of the classic tale, Peter Pan and Wendy embark on a magical adventure to Neverland, where they encounter pirates, fairies, and the importance of growing up. Together, they learn that the true magic lies in friendship and courage.

title: Heart of Stone
description: A secret agent must protect a powerful technology that could change the world. As she navigates a web of deception and danger, she discovers that the heart of the mission lies in the connections she makes along the way.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: A young mermaid princess makes a dangerous deal with a sea witch to become human and win the heart of a prince. As she navigates the challenges of life on land, she learns about love, sacrifice, and the importance of being true to oneself.

title: Sixty Five
description: After a catastrophic event, a pilot crash-lands on a mysterious planet that is home to prehistoric creatures. With time running out, he must find a way to survive and escape before he becomes the next meal for a dinosaur.

title: The Black Demon
description: A family vacation turns into a nightmare when they encounter a legendary creature known as the Black Demon. As they fight for survival, they must confront their deepest fears and the dark secrets that bind them together.

title: The Tank
description: In a remote military facility, a group of soldiers must confront a terrifying entity that has been unleashed from a top-secret tank. As they fight to survive, they uncover the dark history of the tank and the horrors it holds.

title: The Covenant
description: When a powerful artifact is stolen, a group of unlikely heroes must band together to retrieve it before it falls into the wrong hands. As they face formidable foes, they discover the true meaning of friendship and sacrifice.
